name: Operation: Labyrinth Fall
overview: The year 2199 and with the overpopulation and ever decreasing supply available resource on earth, the furure of the Human Race is in doubt A world coalition project was fromed to assess offering a viable alternative home for the Human Race. probes were sent out to numerous planets. Only one planet met all of the requeriments to provide the cradle fro this new civilization - GJ1214B, also known as 'Watwerworld' or more simply 'Earth 2'.
